actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the important contributions of the men and women in the number one industry of New York State, the agriculture industry.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives honoring the important contributions of New York's farmers and other men and women in New York State's agricultural industry.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the important contributions of the men and women in the number one industry of New York State, the agriculture industry.
